titleStmt.title: A true account of the irregular proceedings at Gvild-Hall, about the swearing the two pretended sheriffs Mr. North and Mr. Rich, September 28, 1682
titleStmt.author: Papillon, Thomas, 1623-1702.
Dubois, John.

notesStmt.note: "To the Right Honourable, the Lord Mayor and Court of Aldermen: the humble declaration of Thomas Papillon, mercer, and John Dubois, weaver ...": p. 3.
Reproduction of original in University of Pennsylvania Library.
